results.title: Simvastatin decreases levodopa-induced dyskinesia in monkeys, but not in a randomized, placebo-controlled, multiple cross-over ("n-of-1") exploratory trial of simvastatin against levodopa-induced dyskinesia in Parkinson's disease patients.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ decreases @CHEMICAL_Levodopa @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007980 @@@levodopa@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@dyskinesia@@@ in @SPECIES_9527 @@@monkeys@@@, but not in a randomized, placebo-controlled, multiple cross-over ("n-of-1") exploratory trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ against @CHEMICAL_Levodopa @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007980 @@@levodopa@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@dyskinesia@@@ in @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Assessment of plasma creatine kinase as biomarker for levodopa-induced dyskinesia in Parkinson's disease.
results.text_hl: Plasma @GENE_CMPK1 @GENE_51727 @@@CK@@@ levels were measured in five @DISEASE_Cerebral_Palsy @DISEASE_MESH:D002547 @@@dyskinetic@@@ @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@parkinsonian@@@ non-@SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ primates (NHP) and in ten @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@LID@@@ who participated in a treatment trial with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
